mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id AS postId , c.category_id AS categoryId , c.name AS categoryName , p.writer AS writer , p.title AS title , p.content AS content , p.reg_date AS regDate , p.mod_date AS modDate , p.hit AS hit FROM post p JOIN category c ON p.category_id=c.category_id WHERE p.post_id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET hit=hit+1 WHERE post_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(post_id) FROM post WHERE post_id=#{id} AND password=SHA2(#{password}, 256)
